shinyF7 brings 2 panels with `f7Panel()` that can make you save a significant amount of space.
They can contain any elements, even though inputs are better suitable. Importantly, panels must be enabled
in the `f7Navbar()` via the *left_panel* and *right_panel* arguments.

```r
f7Navbar(
  title = "Tabs",
  hairline = FALSE,
  shadow = TRUE,
  left_panel = TRUE,
  right_panel = TRUE
)
```

Only one panel may also be activated.
